metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1951 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MediaWiki before 1.19.5 and 1.20.x before 1.20.4 and allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via Lua function names.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1951` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.5-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.5-1').
